title: Introduce Your Family Members
desc: Describe your family members including siblings, parents, and relatives.
prompt_en: Tell me about your family members. Who are they and what are they like?
prompt_zh: 請介紹你的家庭成員。他們是誰？他們是什麼樣的人？
sample_questions: How many siblings do you have?
What do your parents do for a living?
Do you have any nieces or nephews?

title: Describe Your Mom
desc: Talk about your mother's appearance, personality, hobbies, and talents.
prompt_en: Describe your mom's appearance and personality. What are her hobbies and talents?
prompt_zh: 描述你媽媽的外貌和個性。她有哪些興趣和才能？
sample_questions: What does your mom look like?

title: Describe Your Dad
desc: Share details about your father's appearance, personality, job, and interests.
prompt_en: Tell me about your dad's appearance, personality, and job. What does he like to do?
prompt_zh: 談談你爸爸的外貌、個性和工作。他喜歡做什麼？
sample_questions: Does your dad look like you?
What kind of personality does he have?

title: Talk About Your Siblings
desc: Discuss your relationships with your brothers and sisters, their personalities, and interests.
prompt_en: Describe your siblings and your relationship with them. What do they like to do?
prompt_zh: 描述你的兄弟姐妹以及你們的關係。他們喜歡做什麼？
sample_questions: Do you get along well with your siblings?
What are your brothers and sisters like?

title: Describe Your Niece and Brother-in-law
desc: Share information about your niece and brother-in-law, their personalities and occupations.
prompt_en: Tell me about your niece and brother-in-law. What are they like and what do they do?
prompt_zh: 談談你的姪女和姐夫。他們是什麼樣的人？他們做什麼工作？
sample_questions: What does your niece like to do?

title: Family Hobbies and Interests
desc: Discuss common hobbies and interests shared by your family members.
prompt_en: What hobbies or interests do your family members share? Do you have any family traditions?
prompt_zh: 你的家人有什麼共同的興趣或嗜好嗎？你們有什麼家庭傳統嗎？
sample_questions: Does your family enjoy gaming together?
What activities do you do as a family?
Are there any special family traditions?
